title: tinai mEyum
sahitya:
tinai mEyum painkiLigAL shevvELaik-kUvirO enai nIngiyavar pOna ellai mudal vADuginrEn


anupallavi

  ini nAnum avar deiva ezhil vaDivu kANbEnO vinai tIra naghai tavazhum vElan mukham kANbEnO


caraNam    shonnadellAm tEn kalandu sholluginra nAvuDaiyIr shuDar vElan pErenrum tozhutturaittal kELIrO 
manniaLar pErazhagA vAvenru pEshiDuvIr manam urugi shOrginrAn vandiDuvA enriDuvIr
